QuestData.Title: Target: Hive'Zora Tunnelers
QuestData.Description: Reinforcements have been called on to join the assault on Hive'Zora. You have been selected to target Hive'Zora tunnelers. Report back to Commander Mar'alith after completing your task.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay 30 Hive'Zora Tunnelers and report back to Commander Mar'alith at Cenarion Hold in Silithus. You must also bring Combat Task Briefing VII in order to complete this quest.
QuestData.CompletionText: You have something to tell me, $c?
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent work, $n. Without their tunnelers, the silithid will have a hard time repairing any damage inflicted to their hive's structure. I assume you'll want a new task.
